title: Stranger on Horseback (1955 Western) Directed by Jacques Tourneur

sources.title: Stranger on Horseback (1955 Western) Directed by Jacques Tourneur
sources.description:
Thunder in the saddle ... greased lightning with his guns ... there never rode a man to match him !
A determined circuit judge rides into a corrupt frontier town dominated by the powerful Bannerman family, who manipulate the law to maintain their control. Despite resistance and challenges to his authority, the judge pursues a trial to restore order and hold the guilty accountable.


Director: Jacques Tourneur
Writers: Herb Meadow, Don Martin, Louis L'Amour
Genres: Drama, Western

Main Cast:
Joel McCrea - Judge Richard 'Rick' Thorne 
Miroslava - Amy Lee Bannerman 
Kevin McCarthy - Tom Bannerman
John Carradine - Col. Buck Streeter
Nancy Gates - Caroline Webb
Emile Meyer - Sheriff Nat Bell
Robert Cornthwaite - Arnold Hammer


00:00 - Full movie with subtitles 
02:09 - Judge Richard Thorne arrives in town, determined to uphold the law in a territory dominated by the Bannerman family.
05:21 - Thorne confronts the Bannermans after learning about Tom Bannerman’s involvement in a fatal shooting.
15:03 - Thorne arrests Tom Bannerman for murder, defying the Bannerman family’s influence and authority.
25:14 - Thorne meets with the Bannerman family, who attempt to intimidate him into releasing Tom.
35:10 - Thorne and his allies secretly prepare to transport Tom and key witnesses to Cottonwood for a fair trial.
45:39 - A tense confrontation unfolds as the Bannermans pursue Thorne and his group through the wilderness.
55:16 - Thorne and his companions face off against the Bannermans in a dramatic showdown on the trail to Cottonwood.
1:00:13 - The final confrontation between Thorne and the Bannermans culminates in a decisive moment of justice and reckoning.
